name: Tower Offense (The Paper Pilot)
description:
This is Tower Offense, by Team NaN, made in 48 hours for Chillenium 2017. Fullscreen Recommended (Button in lower right of game window).

Note: This is a slightly refined version. It has some bug features and added a mute and pause button, for player convenience. If you'd like the pure game jam experience, you can download the game as it was at the end of the 48 hours here.

Thanks to our hero, Sassy Fox

We couldn't have done it without you ❤
